price: Katakanlah, "Pada hari kemenangan 1197 itu tidak berguna bagi orang-orang kafir iman mereka dan tidak pula mereka diberi tangguh."
arabic: قُلۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡفَتۡحِ لَا يَنفَعُ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ
footnotes: 1197.  Hari kemenangan ialah Hari Kiamat atau kemenangan dalam perang Badar atau penaklukan negeri Mekah.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul yawma al-fatḥi lā yanfaʿu alladhīna kafarū īmānuhum walā hum yunẓarūna
